REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f0656 reute d f BC-DIVI-HOTELS-<DVH>-REC 06-19 0043

TEXT.TITLE: DIVI HOTELS <DVH> RECOMMENDS DIVIDEND
TEXT.BODY: Divi Hotels N.V. said its board recommended that shareholders approve payment of an initial dividend of 12-1/2 cts a share semi-annually. It said the dividend would be paid in August and February. Reuter
